source_objects.title: Leadership
source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.

items.title: How to talk to anyone, anywhere and anytime?
items.headline: The exact strategies, methods and tactics of "Naturally social people" use to create great and interesting conversations
objectives_summary: craft yourself as an unforgettable person
Deal with blunders and awkward situation you may fall into accidentally
Walk into a room and get people's attention making them curious to know about you

items.title: NLP Practitioner Training

visible_instructors.title: Wayne Farrell
visible_instructors.job_title: International NLP, Coaching, Hypnosis, Body language trainer
visible_instructors.name: Wayne

items.headline: NLP and Coaching elements of the live 7 day NLP practitioner training.
objectives_summary: Understand the concepts and techniques used in NLP and how to practically apply them in your personal and professional life.
You will learn how to use coaching in various environments and niches.
Learn how to communicate more effectively with your own unconscious mind and to create the type of life you want.

items.title: High-Impact IT Leader - Succeed as CIO/CTO/IT Director 2021!
items.headline: Complete playbook for IT executives on leading strategy, technology, people and operations
objectives_summary: Develop a LEADERSHIP MINDSET
Re-imagine the BUSINESS STRATEGY
Formulate the IT STRATEGY

items.title: Executive Presence: Social Skills and Communication
items.headline: The principles and practice of being a more powerful, memorable, respected and articulate communicator
objectives_summary: How to be more powerful and respected when communicating
Techniques to increase your credibility, authority and likability as a speaker
How to leverage your subcommunication, body language and other elements for more presence

items.title: Public Speaking: Get Booked to Speak in 2021
items.headline: TEDxClapham Founder & public speaking coach, Alex Merry teaches you how pitch your talk + get booked to speak at events
objectives_summary: Identify your exciting speaking proposition.
Find and contact event organisers across the world.
Craft a speech proposal that will land speaking engagements.

items.title: Remote Team Management & Leadership - Manage A Remote Team

visible_instructors.title: Mark Timberlake
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Online Training Courses For Beginners
visible_instructors.name: Mark

visible_instructors.title: Stephen Mather
visible_instructors.job_title: MBPsS, BSc (Hons) Psych, MSc Organizational Psychology
visible_instructors.name: Stephen

items.headline: Managing remote teams - managing remotely as a new manager - understand the benefits and pitfalls of remote managing
objectives_summary: You will learn how to approach remote working as a manager.
You will learn best practices for managing your team online.

items.title: OSHA Control of Hazardous Energy and Lock Out / Tag Out
items.headline: OSHA required training under 29 CFR 1910 and 1926.
objectives_summary: The student will definitively be able to identify hazardous energy and protect themselves and others while working around it.

items.title: The Science, and Psychology, of Change Management !

visible_instructors.title: Sivakami S ; MBA ; Ph.D (ongoing)
visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Business Leader, Academic, and Research Scholar
visible_instructors.name: Sivakami

items.headline: Learn from the Research, and become a Master of effective, and sustainable, Change Management !
objectives_summary: You will understand how Change affects us, and how we react to it
You will learn about the Psychology and Science behind our behaviour and thinking, related to Change
Based on this knowledge, you will learn an effective and sustainable Change Model, with its various steps

items.title: Coaching: The 7 Skills You Really Need
items.headline: How to Master the Subtle Art of Empowering Others
objectives_summary: Understand what coaching is all about, and how it differs from teaching, instructing, mentoring, and counselling.
Elicit what is really important to your client.
Listen. Really, really listen.

items.title: Leadership Masterclass: Learn How to Lead Other People
items.headline: Acquire leadership skills, learn about leadership strategies & theories, and become more self-confident!
objectives_summary: Understand the main leadership theories (ethical leadership theory, great man theory, traits theory, behavioural theory, and contingency theory)
Understand the main leadership styles such as coercive leadership style, coaching leadership style etc.
Master the art of influencing other people & using body language

items.title: Leadership In A Time of Change

visible_instructors.title: BusinessWorks, Inc.
visible_instructors.job_title: Communicate and Connect for A Change
visible_instructors.name: BusinessWorks,

items.headline: From me to my community, an inspiring and practical framework for leadership and change
objectives_summary: Every person is a leader ever since presence was established in the womb!
Growing one’s potential and deciding where one is going are daily decisions of an influencer
Traditional, and often, obligatory reasons and approaches to leading may no longer apply to today’s context!

items.title: Strategies to Improve Your Communication Skills

visible_instructors.title: Maria Drueco
visible_instructors.job_title: HR/ Business Consultant/ Facilitator/ Intercultural Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Maria

items.headline: Strategies to Improve Your Communication Skills And Succeed in Your Career Or Business!
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, you will:
Understand what communication is and why it is an important skill
Identify ways that communication can happen

items.title: Leadership Strategies Mastery 2021

visible_instructors.title: Henry Zhang
visible_instructors.job_title: Teaching YOU How to Become A "Trading Entrepreneur"
visible_instructors.name: Henry

visible_instructors.title: Henry Zhang Support
visible_instructors.job_title: Teaching YOU How to Become A "Trading Entrepreneur"
visible_instructors.name: Henry Zhang

items.headline: Learn the critical 5 steps to becoming an effective leader that your market will follow
objectives_summary: This special course reveals the powerful 5-step system to becoming a productive leader!
Discover the #1 skill shared by every successful leader and how you can ensure it's in your arsenal!
Find out everything you need to know about effective communication! Opening a strong channel of communication will increase your team's productivity and output, instantly!

items.title: Understanding DISC Profiling

visible_instructors.title: Stuart Ross
visible_instructors.job_title: Award winning trainer and transformational coach
visible_instructors.name: Stuart

items.headline: How to use DISC profiling personally and in business to increase results
objectives_summary: Understand the theory of DISC psychometric profiling
Understand the 4 different DISC profiles
Be able to assess a persons profile without taking a the test

items.title: AIGPEs Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Simulation Exam
items.headline: Prepare for AIGPEs Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Exam and access 75 Simulated Exam Questions
objectives_summary: Prepare for AIGPE's Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Exam in a simulated environment
Clear understanding of what to expect in AIGPE's Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Exam
Practice Practice and Practice ample test taking before appearing for AIGPE's Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Exam

items.title: Excellent Public Speaking: Overcoming Stage Fright
items.headline: This Public Speaking Course will teach you how to prepare for a speech, overcome stage fright and give successful talks
objectives_summary: How to prepare for a speech: research, writing up and practice
How to overcome the fear of public speaking
How to deliver a successful speech, anytime
